cvaa.label: Closed Captions Styling Editor
cvaa.description: Adds 'Options' to the closed captions menu where viewers can open a styling editor.

cvaaBtnPosition.label: Button position
cvaaBtnPosition.doc: Set the 'Options' button position within the closed captions menu

useCookie.doc: Allow the use of cookies to save settings. if not used, settings will be set to default upon page refresh

cvaaDefaultSettings.label: Default settings
cvaaDefaultSettings.doc: Initial styling configuration options, if cookies are disabled these options will be set upon page refresh.

initvalue.fontFamily: Arial, Roboto, Arial Unicode Ms, Helvetica, Verdana, PT Sans Caption, sans-serif
